title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form ADM/DBN-2 - Citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form ADM/DBN-2 - Citation

State Regulations
LETTERS OF ADMINISTRATION d.b.n. CITATION
File No. ____________
SURROGATES'S COURT - COUNTY
CITATION
THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK, By the Grace of God Free and

Independent
TO
A petition having been duly filed by
____________, who is domiciled at ____________
YOU ARE HEREBY CITED TO SHOW CAUSE before
the Surrogate's Court, ____________ County, at ____________, New York, on ________, ________, at o'clock in the noon of that day, why a
decree should not be made in the estate of ____________
lately domiciled at ____________
granting administration d.b.n. and
directing that
[ ] Letters of Administration d.b.n. issue
to: ____________
[ ] Letters of Administration d.b.n. with

Limitations issue to: ____________
[ ] Limited Letters of Administration
d.b.n. issue to: ____________
(State any further relief
requested)
HON. Dated, Attested and Sealed, Surrogate
______
(I) [FN3] ( ____________ and I jointly and
severally) undertake that defendant will appear in
______________
Chief Clerk

Attorney for Petitioner

Telephone Number

Address of Attorney
[Note: This citation is served upon you as
required by law. You are not required to appear. If you fail to appear it will
be assumed you do not object to the relief requested. You have a right to have
an attorney appear for you.]
ADM/DBN-2 (7/98)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
ADM/DBN-2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
